author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Electoral Officer Rajesh Lakhoni will receive an award during the 6th National Voters’ Day to be held in New Delhi on Monday.

The Award for Excellence to States was “for a series of innovative measures in use of technology for election management and voter facilitation” and would be received by Mr. Lakhoni, an official release said.

The theme for this year’s National Voters’ Day is ‘Inclusive and qualitative participation.’

The function in New Delhi would be presided over by President Pranab Mukherjee. Chief Election Commissioner Nasim Zaidi would release a book, Belief in the ballot, and present the first copy to Mr. Mukherjee.

Election Commission came into being on January 25 in 1950.
title: Lakhoni to receive award today
